Class AbstractCompositeConstraint

java.lang.Object
  org.drools.rule.MutableTypeConstraint
      org.drools.rule.AbstractCompositeConstraint
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, AlphaNodeFieldConstraint, BetaNodeFieldConstraint, Constraint, RuleComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AndConstraint, OrConstraint
public abstract class AbstractCompositeConstraint
extends MutableTypeConstraint

A superclass for all composite constraints, like "OR" and "AND"

See Also:
